name: Barnaby's Quest
description:
You're Barnaby, the greatest mole treasure hunter there is! Your goal is to explore this cave and find the ancient treasure that lies within it, but be careful. Traps are laid out, avoid them and get to the treasure safely.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Move

Spacebar - Jump

E - Interact

P - Pause

Mouse - Aim for the digging direction

Left Mouse Button - Dig
